news.title: Matt Cameron Leaves Pearl Jam After 27 Years as Drummer
news.summary: Cameron played on numerous albums with the rock band after joining in 1998, and he was inducted into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame in 2017

news.summary: Our weekly playlist highlights songs that our writers, editors, and contributors are listening to on repeat

news.title: Mark Lipsitz, Bar/None Records Label Manager, Dies at 62
news.summary: A passionate figure who largely worked behind the scenes, Lipsitz championed bands like Ivy, Emperor X, and the Paranoid Style
